channel.title: Hot pepper vs. the water
channel.description: hey this is really random but, could someone maybe make a script for this game? its at http://forums.krazyletter.com/index.php?act=Arcade&do=stats&gameid=500 (sorry this came out as a link, all i did was type in the letters, none of the {url}{/url} stuff) i already have a high score, (arcade guest with comment "eet eez teh ub3r e4zee gam3") but i would like to see if it can be made even easier.

item.title: Hot pepper vs. the water
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

I’ll try to make a simple script for this game after school. But just so you know this game looks like a waste of time and not very addicting either.

Read full topic

item.title: Hot pepper vs. the water
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Well, you can just keep it only shooting the low targets to keep it safe. Just use coords with clickmouse and maybe holding down and releasing the mouse butting using HoldMouse(x, y, True); and ReleaseMouse(x, y, True);. That would probabyl work with some short waits in between.

Read full topic

item.title: Hot pepper vs. the water
item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

yeah, for example my score on super clicker 2.0. all i did was make it click however many times, and it got me over 250,000 clicks. its fairly simple for some of them.

Read full topic

item.title: Hot pepper vs. the water
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

Lol I guess it’s just me. I didn’t even get over 100 points legitly! It’s obvious on some of those games that people use programs to play for them, because some of the highscores were like in the 2millions.

Read full topic

item.title: Hot pepper vs. the water
item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

well, i tried to make a script for it, and it was very simple but it did almost as well as my human score. what i had it do was click 3 times to the pepper’s left, wait 400ms, click 3 times to pepper’s right, wait 400ms, repeat. with 75ms waits between clicks, that got me about 3100 points. so its obvious that it can have a script made for it. thanks for giving it a look anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Hot pepper vs. the water
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

I’ll take a look at it. I’ll post back in a lil.

EDIT: ok I looked at it. I really don’t think you can do anything about it because it’s such a fast moving game.

Read full topic
